page.title: 09Farming In And Around Wragby
page.content: {MOOR FARM,WEST BARKWITH { Moor Farm is owned by Mr.Johnson and covers 56.75 acres(23.1 hectares.) There is 1 acre of{grassland,}2 acres of{buildings}and all the rest are {crops.}Mr.Johnson has got 2{sheep, which are pets, and 2500{chickens, which are kept for laying fertile eggs. Mr.Johnson and his family have owned Moor Farm for 24 years.For holidays,he gets 1 or 2 weekends and about 5 days a year.Each year,he gets rid of the chickens for a 5 week period so that he can clean out the sheds.He and his mother are the main workers,but his wife helps out as well when she has some spare time. There are 3{tractors,}a{sugar-beet {harvester,}a{harrow}and a{combine {harvester}at the farm.
